message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $12,000. I believe it holds significant value and could greatly benefit you.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I am only willing to pay up to $8,000 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I understand your position. How about we meet in the middle at $10,000? This would be a fair deal considering the value this product offers.
Thank you for your response, Alice. I appreciate your offer, but I still believe the product should be priced closer to my valuation. I am willing to pay $9,000 for it.
